import groupedContinuousWithDateOrderSampleData from '../../sample-data/grouped-continuous-with-date-order.js';
import ChartFrame from '../../components/chart-frame';
import ConnectedScatterChart from './';

<Meta title="Templates/Connected Scatter chart" component={ConnectedScatterChart} />

# Connected Scatter chart

Type: Correlation, change over time

TKTK

**When to use**

- TKTK

**Examples from the FT:**

- [Unemployment rate vs regular pay growth](https://www.ft.com/content/40c604d2-c01c-11e9-89e2-41e555e96722)

**Questions?**

- Shepherd: TKTK
- Developer: TKTK

---

## Demos

---

### Basic connected scatter chart

<Preview>
  <Story name="Connected Scatter Chart Basic">
    <ConnectedScatterChart
      data={groupedContinuousWithDateOrderSampleData}
      xVariable="rig"
      yVariable="output"
      colorVariable="group"
      orderVariable="date"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>
